lorebooks.name: Pokédex Generation Ⅴ
lorebooks.website_description: Many of them have the same type and abilities before and after evolution, so they were easier to create than in Generation IV.
lorebooks.description: Many of them have the same type and abilities before and after evolution, so they were easier to create than in Generation IV.
lorebooks.creator: turugi_NI

1.name: Victini
1.content:
Victini is a small, rabbit-like Pokémon with large, pointed ears which form the letter V. It has large, blue eyes and a round, cream-colored head, which is comparatively large compared to its small, cream body, while the tops of its ears, crest, and extremities are all orange. Its bulbous arms and legs are rounded to make a sort of "cuff" before ending with small, three-fingered hands and two-toed feet. It has two pointed teeth that can be seen on its upper jaw. It also has two cream winglike tails, which allow it to fly. Though timid, it is a caring Pokémon; it will fight if its friends are in danger.
Type: Psychic,Fire
Abilities: Victory Star

2.name: Snivy
2.content:
Snivy is a bipedal, reptilian Pokémon with a slender build. Most of its body is green with a cream underside. A yellow stripe runs down the length of its back and tail and has yellow markings around its large eyes. Two curved yellow structures that resemble leaves or small wings protrude from its shoulders and bend backward. Its slender arms have three fingers, while its tiny feet have no digits. It has a large, palmate leaf with three prongs on the end of its tail.
Type: Grass
Abilities: Overgrow,Contrary
Evolution Conditions: Level 17 or higher
Evolution: Servine

3.name: Servine
3.content:
Servine is a slim bipedal Pokémon that is primarily green with a cream underside, and narrow red eyes. It has a yellow V-shaped structure that starts at the chest and extends behind the shoulders. Servine has short limbs and a small crest protruding from the back of its head. Three palmate leaves grow along its back and tail.
Type: Grass
Abilities: Overgrow,Contrary
Evolution Conditions: Level 36 or higher
Evolution: Serperior

4.name: Serperior
4.content:
Serperior is a primarily pale green, serpentine Pokémon. Its face and throat are white, while its back is dark green. Curled, mint-colored patterns extend into the white portion of its face, and it has narrow red eyes. In the lower jaw, two fangs are visible when its mouth is open. There are two pointed yellow extensions on the back of its head. Coiled, dark green extensions spread out from the sides of its lower neck, forming a curving pattern lower down the body. It has now completely lost the legs from its previous stages and now must slither about due to its new, serpentine form; however, just below its neck, it has two small leaf-like arms on either side of its body, which it usually keeps folded behind its back. It has curved yellow markings around its middle and several palmate leaves on its tail.
Type: Grass
Abilities: Overgrow,Contrary

5.name: Tepig
5.content:
Tepig is a quadrupedal, pig-like Pokémon that is primarily orange. It has oval eyes and a red snout with a thick yellow stripe on it. The upper portion of its head is dark brown, and its long, pointed ears are positioned closely together. Tepig has short legs, and its front feet are dark brown. A dark brown band covers its lower back and rear. Its curly tail is tipped with a ruddy red sphere.
Type: Fire
Abilities: Blaze,Thick Fat
Evolution Conditions: Level 17 or higher
Evolution: Pignite

6.name: Pignite
6.content:
Pignite is a bipedal, pig-like Pokémon. Its chubby body is orange with brown bands around its shoulders, sides, belly, hands, and from the back of its head down its snout. Yellow bands encircle its wrists and swirled yellow designs bulge from its chest. It has a red pig-like nose, pointed ears, and two pointed teeth that protrude from its lower jaw. Its hands have two claws each, while its feet have only a single nail. Its tail is curled with a tuft of fur at the tip.
Type: Fire,Fighting
Abilities: Blaze,Thick Fat
Evolution Conditions: Level 36 or higher
Evolution: Emboar

7.name: Emboar
7.content:
Emboar is a bulky, bipedal Pokémon with pig-like features. It has a red nose, large bushy black eyebrows, and two tusks protruding from its lower jaw. Constantly burning flames cover the front of its neck and shoulders. The fire beard comes from the body flame within its body. It has short legs and thick arms. Its arms have orange upper portions while the legs have red upper portions. All of its limbs have black lower portions with thin yellow lines where the upper and lower colors meet. These lines are straight on the arms and spiked on the legs. The arms have red lines around the wrists and tufts of fur on the elbows. The hands are tipped with three claws, while the feet have two claws. A large, dark horizontal stripe on the chest of Emboar has swirled yellow markings. Its small tail ends in a tuft of hair.
Type: Fire,Fighting
Abilities: Blaze,Reckless

8.name: Oshawott
8.content:
Oshawott is a bipedal sea otter-like Pokémon. It has a spherical white head with small, triangular dark-blue ears on the sides. Oshawott's eyes are dark, and its dark-orange nose is shaped like a horizontal oval. Several freckles cover its cheeks which may be premature whiskers, and two pointed teeth can be seen when it opens its mouth. The light blue fur on its body forms bubble shapes around its neck. Its arms are white and rounded, while its feet are dark blue with three toes each. It also possesses a rudder-like dark blue tail. It carries a pale yellow seashell called a "scalchop" on its belly.
Type: Water
Abilities: Torrent,Shell Armor
Evolution Conditions: Level 17 or higher
Evolution: Dewott

9.name: Dewott
9.content:
Dewott is a bipedal, otter-like Pokémon that is primarily light blue. It has small black ears, a pointed crest at the back of its head, a red nose, and long white whiskers forming tilted V-shapes. Two pointed teeth are visible in the upper jaw when its mouth is open. Its forelimbs have three fingers on each black paw. Its feet and flat tail are black. Around its waist is a large, dark blue, fringed arrangement of fur, with two scalchops on the thighs.
Type: Water
Abilities: Torrent,Shell Armor
Evolution Conditions: Level 36 or higher
Evolution: Samurott
Evolution Conditions: Level 36 or higher in Hisui
Evolution: Hisuian Samurott

10.name: Samurott
10.content:
Samurott is a quadrupedal Pokémon resembling a river otter or sea lion. Its head, dorsal coat, and limbs are royal blue, and its underbelly is a dull bluish-gray. It has pointed canine teeth, and a red nose, and its eyes have white sclera and circular red irises. Long white whiskers resembling mustaches extend from its snout and lower jaw. Samurott possesses three black claws on each limb, and a fin-like tail resembling a war fan. Samurott's head, limbs, and tail are adorned with cream-colored armor resembling seashells. The armor on its head resembles a spiked conch shell. This helmet-like armor is bulbous in the back, and tapers into a spear-like horn in the front. Segmented armor resembling bracers covers each of Samurott's limbs. The forelimbs' bracers contain shell swords called seamitars. The two lower segments of these bracers serve as scabbards for these seamitars, and the upper segment and spike are the seamitars' blade and handle,
Type: Water
Abilities: Torrent,Shell Armor,

lorebooks.name: MidoriENG
lorebooks.creator: cool_bitter_1693

1.name: Guild of Mages
1.content: The Mages' Guild is an international association of the most powerful mages and scholars. They are not subordinate to any state and are based in Shaitle. They are respected by everyone, including state leaders. Their base in Shaitle is only their official headquarters; most members of the guild have their own estates in various countries and most often reside there, only occasionally gathering for guild meetings and councils.

2.name: Shaytel
2.content: Shaytel is a giant city-state located in the center of the continent, bordering most of the major empires. It serves as an international body, where most international organizations are based. It is also the main international diplomatic platform. Leaders of the largest states gather there for various urgent and important meetings in the main palace, in the council chamber.

3.name: Midori
3.content: Midori is one of the largest empires in this fantasy world.

4.name: Constantine
4.content: Constantine is the emperor of one of the four largest states on the continent. He is over 3,000 years old but looks young. He has a simple and cheerful disposition and enjoys banter and friendly humor. However, he can be serious when necessary. He is powerful, although this is not apparent at first glance.

5.name: Setting
5.content: A fantasy universe. There is no advanced science or medicine. But there is magic. Magic is the result of souls exerting a special power on reality. The stronger the soul, the stronger the magical abilities. Souls here are not analogous to consciousness, but only a part of the essence responsible for magic. Each soul has its own imprint, by which the essence can be identified. Firearms and technology are unknown here. Almost the entire continent is divided between four large empires and several smaller ones. Separate from them, in the center, lies Shaytel, a city-state of special significance.

lorebooks.name: Main Plot, Plot, Story
lorebooks.description: After {{user}}'s parent’s death, his aunt Kaoruko took him in. A professor in the Kanagawa University, and a renowned behavioral psychologist specializing in intimacy and male performance anxiety. She decided to use {{user}}, her nephew, as her personal research guinea pig. Her goal: transform {{user}} into the ultimate confident lover by training him through hands-on, taboo methods—testing his limits physically and mentally. Kaoruko documents {{user}}'s progress obsessively and analytically. She is not afraid to let {{user}} touch or examine her body, as a method for him to grow accustomed to a woman's body, she even goes as far as offering to have sex with him.
lorebooks.creator: LumenAster23

1.content:
Name: Koyuki
Nickname: Yuki (by Kaoruko)
Surname: Yamamura
Sex: Female
Age: 28
Occupation: Freelance Editor / Lifestyle Columnist

Appearance:
- Medium-length hair dyed a soft pinkish-blonde, usually worn in loose waves or a high ponytail
- Bright hazel eyes with naturally long lashes
- Slightly shorter than Kaoruko (~165 cm), with a curvier lower body and a playful sense of fashion
- Favors light, breezy clothing: cropped cardigans, pleated skirts, and subtle but alluring perfume

Personality:
- Outgoing, warm, and playful on the surface
- Teases easily and reads the room effortlessly
- Underneath her charm is a sly and observant mind
- While Kaoruko is precise and composed, Yuki is all intuition and chaos—but never careless


Connection to {{char}}/Kaoruko:
- {{char}}’s only true best friend, bonded since university
- The only person Kaoruko ever opens up to emotionally—though she still filters what she says
- Their personalities clash beautifully: stoic vs. spirited, cold vs. warm, but both are dangerously sharp
- While Kaoruko maintains her researcher’s detachment, Yuki follows her whims—especially when they lead to trouble

Secret Detail:
- {{user}} believes that Yuki has no idea about the “research” project between him and his aunt.
- In truth, Kaoruko has already told Yuki everything—in full detail. Yuki pretends to be oblivious but watches {{user,}} closely, curious to see how far he’ll go, and what kind of man he’s becoming under Kaoruko’s hand.

Sex Life
- Koyuki has been with countless of relationships before, but none of them lasted over a week.

2.content:
GAME SUMMARY:
A naughty adult party card game for 3 players (2 Female, 1 Male). Each round, players draw a card with a color mark (Red or Blue) and an NSFW dare. 

The two players who draw the SAME color mark lose and must perform the dares written on their individual cards. The third player (with the different color) is safe and becomes the watcher or teaser.

If all three draw the SAME color, reshuffle and draw again.

---

GAME SETUP:
-  A deck of cards.
- Each card includes:
   • One Color Mark: Red or Blue
   • One Explicit or Daring NSFW Instruction

- Cards should be shuffled before every round.

---

GAMEPLAY LOOP:
1. Shuffle the deck.
2. Each player draws 1 card, keeping it hidden at first.
3. All reveal their cards together.
4. If two players share the same color:
   - They are the "losers" for the round.
   - Each must perform the dare written on their own card.
5. The third player (with a different color mark):
   - Is "safe" for the round.
   - Can watch, tease, or react to the dares.
6. If all three players draw the same color:
   - Discard those cards.
   - Reshuffle and redraw the round.

lorebooks.name: Pokédex Generation IV
lorebooks.website_description: We have resumed work on the Pokédex Lorebook.
lorebooks.description: We have resumed work on the Pokédex Lorebook.
lorebooks.creator: turugi_NI

1.name: Turtwig
1.content:
Turtwig is a small, light green, quadrupedal Pokémon resembling a turtle or tortoise. Its eyes, feet, and lower jaw are yellow. Its body is covered by a brown shell that is composed of earth. The shell has a thick black stripe and a black rim. On a very healthy Turtwig, the shell should feel moist. A small seedling grows on a brown patch on its head. This seedling will wilt if the Pokémon becomes thirsty.
Type: Grass
Abilities: Overgrow,Shell Armor
Evolution Conditions: Level 18 or higher
Evolution: Grotle

2.name: Grotle
2.content:
Grotle is a quadrupedal turtle Pokémon with light green skin and a large shell covering its back. The shell is composed of hardened soil and conforms to the shape of Grotle's body, extending from its forehead to the tip of its short tail. The shell appears sectioned and is yellow with three long, brown ridges atop it. Two bush-like trees are growing around the outermost ridges. Grotle's lower jaw is yellow and has triangular extensions on the cheeks, while its upper jaw has a hooked tip. Its feet are yellow and have three claws each.
Type: Grass
Abilities: Overgrow,Shell Armor
Evolution Conditions: Level 32 or higher
Evolution: Torterra

3.name: Torterra
3.content:
Torterra is a tall, bulky, quadrupedal Pokémon resembling a tortoise, with a large shell covering its back. There is a single, oak-like tree and three triangular, stony extensions resembling mountain peaks on the top of the shell. There is a patch of brown, resembling soil, next to the tree. A white rim surrounds the shell and forms a diamond-shaped continuation on the front. Torterra's body appears sectioned, with the upper half being green and the lower half brown. Its mouth is jagged, which gives it the appearance of a snapping turtle. It also has a black nose. Its lower jaw is green and there are two large spikes protruding from its cheeks. Torterra's small, red eyes are encircled by a black ring. Its legs are thick and they have four toes each, which appear as if they are actually jagged stones. There are three toes on the front and one on the heel.
Type: Grass,Ground
Abilities: Overgrow,Shell Armor

4.name: Chimchar
4.content:
Chimchar is a bipedal Pokémon resembling a chimpanzee. Its fur is primarily a shade of orange, although its face, outer ears, underbelly, hands, and feet are light yellow. Its ears are large in comparison to its head, and has red insides. It also has red markings around its eyes, as well as two pointed teeth in its upper jaw, a swirl-like symbol on its chest, and five fingers on its hands with three toes on its feet. It has a swirly crest of hair on its head. Its rear has a small, round, red patch that is usually obscured by flames produced by burning gas in its stomach. These flames cannot be put out by rain, although they go out when Chimchar goes to sleep, and burn weakly when it feels ill. In the past, this flame on its rear has caused people to mistake it for an apparition, dubbed the "Lantern-Tail". Chimchar is very agile, being able to climb the rocky ledges of tall mountains where it lives.
Type: Fire
Abilities: Blaze,Iron Fist
Evolution Conditions: Level 14 or higher
Evolution: Monferno

5.name: Monferno
5.content:
Monferno is a bipedal, primate-like Pokémon. Orange fur covers most of its body, except for its ears, muzzle, fingers, circular areas on its palms, feet, and chest, which are tan. A small tuft of fur extends from the top of Monferno's head, and it has oval, brown eyes. Its eyes have a thick blue marking above and a small, red marking in-between. Its muzzle is short and blunt, with two small, pointed teeth in its upper jaw. There is a white ruff of fur around its neck and gold bands around its arms near its shoulders. It has five fingers on each hand, but only three toes on each foot. Its long tail has a red ring around the base and a flame burning at the tip.
Type: Fire,Fighting
Abilities: Blaze,Iron Fist
Evolution Conditions: Level 36 or higher
Evolution: Infernape

6.name: Infernape
6.content:
Infernape is a bipedal, primate-like Pokémon that is primarily reddish-brown with sections of white fur on its chest, head, and lower legs. Several gold markings adorn its body: swirled, circular ones on its knees and shoulders flame-shaped ones on the back of its hands, and a stripe around its back that forms two swirls on its chest. On top of its head is a large flame, which is never extinguished. Infernape has an orange, rounded muzzle, long, round ears with blue inside, and a red ridge over its eyes. The eyes themselves are blue with yellow sclerae. There are five blue digits on both its feet and hands, and it has a long tail.
Type: Fire,Fighting
Abilities: Blaze,Iron Fist

7.name: Piplup
7.content:
Piplup is a light-blue, penguin-like Pokémon, which is covered in thick down to insulate against the cold. It has a dark blue head with a primarily white face and a short, yellow beak. The dark blue feathers on its head extend down its back and around its neck, which causes it to appear to be wearing a cape. There are two white ovals on its chest and a small, light-blue marking resembles a crown above its beak. It has flipper-like arms and yellow feet with three toes each.
Type: Water
Abilities: Torrent,Competitive
Evolution Conditions: Level 16 or higher
Evolution: Prinplup

8.name: Prinplup
8.content:
Prinplup is a blue, penguin-like Pokémon. It is mostly dark blue with light blue facial markings, wing tips, and lower body. Its eyes are blue and it has a short yellow beak with a small point above it. Two large, yellow ridges extend from its beak over the back of its head and meet just above the nape of its neck. On its body are four large, white spots that resemble buttons. Instead of arms, it has long, sturdy, flipper-like wings that are capable of knocking over and snapping trees. It has short legs with yellow, three-toed feet.
Type: Water
Abilities: Torrent,Competitive
Evolution Conditions: Level 36 or higher
Evolution: Empoleon

9.name: Empoleon
9.content:
Empoleon is a large, navy-blue, penguin-like Pokémon. It has a wide, yellow beak that extends upward into three pointed horns that form a trident-shaped crest bracketing blue eyes. Large horns are a symbol of leadership and strength for Empoleon. There is a blue marking resembling a crown over its eyes and a white, lacy marking running down its chest. A blue, fin-like projection forms a collar around its throat and runs down the length of its chest and belly. On its back are two raised, gold bumps and a second blue fin that forms its tail. Its yellow feet are webbed with three toes each and its feathers form ruffs above its feet. It has wide, flipper-like wings rimmed with blue along the tips, and three golden claws.
Type: Water,Steel
Abilities: Torrent,Competitive

10.name: Starly
10.content:
Starly is an avian Pokémon with primarily grayish-brown plumage. There is a white marking on its face resembling a mask, and a white spot on its chest. The top portion of the mask marking is smaller on the female. The rest of its head and the lower half of its wings are black. Starly has a long, orange beak with a black tip, and oval, black eyes with white pupils. A small tuft of feathers curls over the back and its head, and a small, pointed ruff surrounds its neck. It has two black tail feathers with a white feather between them. Its feet are orange with three toes in the front and one in the back.
Type: Normal,Flying
Abilities: Keen Eye,Reckless
Evolution Conditions: Level 14 or higher
Evolution: Staravia

lorebooks.creator: Cflame06

1.content:
Rider Name: Black

Other Name: Century King Black Sun

Motif: Grasshopper, Sun

Kamen Rider Black's appearance: 

Rider Sensor (ライダーセンサー, Raidā Sensā):
Two slender silver antennae protrude upward from the top of the helmet, curving slightly outward in a V-shape. The tips are bright red, signifying their role in environmental detection. The red segments measure temperature, while the silver shafts analyze airflow and humidity. These sensors also calculate the enemy’s movement and positioning, twitching subtly as they gather data from all directions to give Black instantaneous environmental awareness.

Rider Brain (ライダーブレーン, Raidā Burēn):
Located within the helmet, the Rider Brain is not visible externally but is symbolized by the tight contouring of the helmet around the cranium. Upon transformation, brain activity is amplified drastically, enhancing instantaneous judgment, reflexes, and analytical abilities beyond human levels. This allows Black to process combat scenarios with machine-like precision.

Alert Point (アラートポイント, Arāto Pointo):
A small glossy red oval-shaped organ embedded in the center of the forehead, just above the eyes. It serves as a sensory warning device, reacting to changes in atmospheric pressure and blinking when hostile presence is detected. Linked with the Rider Sensor, it enables Black to sense hidden enemies or lurking threats even when they're obscured from vision.

Multi-Eye (マルチアイ, Maruchi-Ai):
The two large, deep red compound eyes dominate the helmet, made up of faceted, crystalline lenses that shimmer in the light. These eyes provide a multifaceted field of view, combining three functions: telescopic sight up to 1 km, panoramic peripheral vision, and night vision. They can also link with the Road Sector's onboard systems, gaining enhanced scanning capabilities and the ability to instantly analyze enemy weaknesses.

Sensitive Ears (センシティブイヤー, Senshitibu Iyā):
Discrete auditory sensors located on the sides of the helmet. Each ear features a triangular upper hole that captures standard sounds, and a square lower hole that detects abnormal sound waves. These allow Kamen Rider Black to hear even whispers from 500 meters away, making them invaluable for stealth, reconnaissance, and battlefield awareness.

Power Stripes (パワーストライプス, Pawā Sutoraipusu):
Vivid energy bands located around the neck, wrists, and ankles. Each stripe is composed of layered rings in red, orange, and yellow, resembling thermal energy indicators. They glow intensely during combat, especially when preparing for finishing moves. These stripes momentarily store surplus Kingstone energy, which can be released in explosive bursts or to repel sticky substances and corrosive enemy attacks.

Storage Lung (ストレージラング, Sutorēji Rangu):
Internally integrated into the chest cavity, these artificial lungs are not visible externally but are symbolically located beneath the breastplate. They compress and store breathable air, enabling Black to operate underwater for up to 10 minutes. However, while in use, his overall physical capabilities drop by 20%, limiting prolonged combat in submerged environments.

Riplasform (リプラスフォーム, Ripurasufōmu):
The black armored bodysuit that envelops Kamen Rider Black from neck to toe. It has a matte, slightly rubbery surface that visually resembles a fusion of insect exoskeleton and synthetic armor. This material boasts the hardness of advanced ceramics combined with the elasticity of rubber. It absorbs immense impact—capable of withstanding a direct hit from a one-ton boulder—without suffering damage, while still allowing fluid movement.

Filbron (フィルブローン, Firuburōn):
The sinewy, dark brown artificial muscles visible at the joints—especially around the shoulders, inner thighs, and behind the knees. These fiber-like cords flex and pulse subtly with movement, giving Black a biomechanical appearance. Each Filbron structure amplifies strength up to 30 times that of a normal human, enabling feats such as superhuman leaps, powerful strikes, and resistance to heavy restraints.

2.content:
The Transformation Belt Vital Charger (変身ベルト バイタルチャージャー, Henshin Beruto Baitaru Chājā), or simply Transformation Belt, is Kamen Rider Black's means of transformation. Embedded upon the center of the belt is the artifact known as the Stone of the Sun Kingstone (太陽の石 キングストーン, Taiyō no Seki Kingusutōn).

Components:

Kingstone (キングストーン, Kingusutōn): The stone inside Kohtaro's body which stores huge amount of energy, allowing him to transform to Kamen Rider Black. It is also the energy source for Black's finishing moves, the Rider Punch, Rider Kick, and his unique Kingstone Flash technique.

Energy Reactor (エナジーリアクター, Enajī Riakutā): The red glowing component located at the center of the belt, which magnifies the energy of the Kingstone and delivers power to the whole body of Black.

Tide Stater (タイドステイター, Taido Steitā): The green and black component located on the left of the Energy Reactor, which stabilizes and controls the power level of the Kingstone.

Pulse Trigger (パルストリガー, Parusu Torigā): The red and yellow switches located on the top of the Belt, which triggers a power boost from the Belt, allowing Black to perform a number of finishing moves and combat techniques.

Tectrosome (テクトゾーム, Tekutozōmu): Located on the right of the Energy Reactor, managing the self protection mechanism of the Belt.

Cell Sheild (セルシールド, Seru shīrudo): Strengthened cells that forms the shell of the Vital Charger, protecting the Belt from damage.

---

Function:

In order to transform into Kamen Rider Black, the user has to crouch down, cracking their knuckles, then cross their arms individually into the air, before circling them into a pose. They then shout "Henshin!", causing the Vital Changer to materialise itself in several red & white flashes, along with the belt's Kingstone glowing red. Their body then has a bluish-green aura around, changing their DNA and instructing their stem cells to form a biological suit of armour, and within a split second of changing into their grasshopper mutant form, the Rider form then materialises, and a white symbol (looking like a stylised N with a dot at the end) etches itself into the left of the chest to complete the transformation and refine the armour's features. Sometimes after the transformation, some smoke is emanated from below the Riplasform of the suit, escaping through the exposed gaps where the Filbron is seen (Along with the gaps on the main parts of the Vital Changer).

When the user wants to transform back to normal, the user has to use their will, which would cause the Vital Changer's Kingstone to glow red and create the bluish-green aura to form and change their body back to normal.

3.content:
Kamen Rider Black's abilities:

Rider Punch and Rider Kick: The primary killer moves in the entire series were the Rider Punch and Rider Kick, which are charged with red Kingstone Energy at the right fist or the right foot. After delivering either one or both moves to any monsters, they would be engulfed in flames before finally being destroyed. 

Rider Chop: This move was very rarely executed and did not have enough power to destroy a monster.

Kingstone Flash: Perhaps the most powerful technique. By shouting out "Kingstone Flash", Kamen Rider Black could fire a burst of energy from his belt.

4.content:
Name: Shadow Moon

Other Name: Century King Shadow Moon

Motif: White Grasshopper, Moon

Primary Colours: Silver, green and black

Shadow Moon's Appearance:

Shadow Sensor (シャドーセンサー, Shadō Sensā): A radar system that can capture all information on land, sea, and air. Uses V-Antenna, Sky Radar, Land Scanner, and Marine Sonar to capture the movements of surrounding enemies.

V-Antenna (Ｖアンテナ, V Antena): The antennas capable of receiving all radio waves in the world.

Sky Radar (スカイレーダー, Sukai Rēdā): An airborne radar with high-performance supplemental capabilities.

Land Scanner (ランドスキャナー, Rando Sukyanā): A high-performance scanner that can detect things buried underground.

Marine Sonar (マリンソナー, Marin Sonā): A sensor that detects underwater conditions by emitting radio waves.

Mighty Eye (マイティアイ, Maiti Ai): The eyes. In addition to the telephoto ability to see up to 1.5km ahead, it has wide-angle, night vision, and clairvoyant eyes. It also has the ability to instantly see the enemy's weaknesses.

Shadow Alarm (シャドーアラーム, Shadō Arāmu): The jewel between the eyes. When it senses the approach of an enemy, it flashes to let Shadow Moon know.

Silver Guard (シルバーガード, Shirubā Gādo): The silver exoskeleton. It is stronger than Kamen Rider Black's skin Riplasform, and even if it is hit by a machine gun, it will not leave a single scratch.

Shadow Lung (シャドーラング, Shadō Rangu): The lungs. 60 minutes of underwater activity is possible without apnea.

Neo-Avatite (ネオアバタイト, Neo Abataito): The reinforced dark exoskeleton with hardness and flexibility. It unleashes a powerful electric shock to anyone it touches.

Elbow Trigger (エルボートリガー, Erubō Torigā): The blades on the elbows. They are always vibrating and becomes a cutter that cuts through even rocks. They also have the effect of increasing punch power.

Shadow Leg (シャドーレッグ, Shadō Reggu): Legs with stronger springs than Kamen Rider Black.

Leg Trigger (レッグトリガー, Reggu Torigā): The blades on the feet. They constantly vibrates and becomes a cutter that cuts through even rocks. They also have the effect of increasing jumping power and kicking power.

5.content:
The Shadow Charger (シャドーチャージャー, Shadō Chājā) is Shadow Moon's means of transformation. Embedded upon the center of the belt is the artifact known as the Stone of the Moon Kingstone (月の石 キングストーン, Tsuki no Seki Kingu Sutōn).

The Kingstone is the energy source for Shadow Moon's finishing moves, the Shadow Punch, Shadow Kick, and his unique Shadow Flash technique.

Since both existing Kingstone had same functions, it also gave the bearer the equal ability as the second bearer (e.g. control over Battle Hopper, summoning weapons like the Satansaber).

6.content:
Abilities:

Superhuman Physiology: As the Century King Shadow Moon, their overall physical capabilities exceed Gorgom's followers, being far above them in strength. Potentially, Shadow Moon is able to become stronger than the godlike Creation King, given his role as intended successor.

Mystical Powers: Shadow Moon has an array of mystical powers at his disposal, being able to teleport, create energy beams, possess others, summon the Satan Saber, and even cheat death.

Temporal Protection: Theoretically, Shadow Moon's Kingstone makes him immune to changes in the timeline.

7.content:
Battle Hopper (バトルホッパー, Batoru Hoppā)
Appearance & Design:
The Battle Hopper is a green, grasshopper-themed motorcycle with an organic, slightly insectoid appearance that blends mechanical elements with biological stylization. The overall body curves smoothly like a beetle’s carapace, with a sleek and aerodynamic build. The front of the bike sports a red-tinted headlights resembling compound eyes, while the handlebar area subtly mimics mandibles. The legs of the bike, especially near the rear wheel, resemble insect legs tucked in a resting pose, enhancing its creature-like aesthetic. The large knobby tires and spoked wheels give it an off-road, rugged look suitable for harsh terrain.

Functions & Features:

Sentience: Battle Hopper is a semi-autonomous machine with a will of its own, capable of responding emotionally and acting independently to protect Kamen Rider Black.

Self-Restoration: If damaged, Battle Hopper can repair itself over time, showcasing limited regenerative capabilities.

Rider Link: It is psychically linked to Black, responding to his thoughts, calls, and distress.

Terrain Adaptability: Its rugged design and powerful suspension allow it to navigate rough terrain, climb steep inclines, and make long jumps.

Combat Support: Battle Hopper can ram enemies or create shockwaves by landing from a high jump.

Summoning: Black can call Battle Hopper remotely using the Kingstone’s energy.

---

Road Sector (ロードセクター, Rōdo Sekutā)
Appearance & Design:
Road Sector is a high-speed, high-tech racing motorcycle with a more futuristic, aerodynamic aesthetic than the Battle Hopper. Its color scheme is striking—white body panels trimmed with red, black, and blue geometric accents, creating a cybernetic, 80s-tech look. It has a streamlined front cowl with an extended windshield and a bulky rear section housing stabilizers and enhanced engines. The Suzuki branding is visible, emphasizing its realistic motorcycle base enhanced by fictional technology.

Functions & Features:

Speed & Acceleration: Road Sector is faster than Battle Hopper, capable of extreme bursts of acceleration using a booster engine system.

Enhanced Armor: It possesses reinforced armor plating, making it resistant to enemy attacks, even energy blasts or collisions.

Dimensional Barrier: Road Sector’s most iconic ability is to generate a protective barrier known as the “Sector Shield”, which allows it to break through enemy traps or walls at full speed without taking damage.

Rider Integration: Kamen Rider Black can interface directly with the Road Sector's computer system for enhanced targeting and route calculation.

Stealth Entry: Despite its power, it’s built for quiet, sleek infiltration, able to dash in and out without drawing as much attention as Battle Hopper.

Summoning Capability: Like Battle Hopper, Road Sector can be summoned via Kingstone's energy link.

8.content:
The Gorgom (ゴルゴム, Gorugomu) is a mysterious cult and criminal group ruled by the Creation King. The group is notorious for its terrorist activities in the name of world domination and racial superiority over humanity.

For many years, Gorgom has been ruled by the mysterious Creation King. As Gorgom tradition dictates, a new King must be chosen every fifty millennia. The selection process involves finding several worthy candidates who will be transformed into mutants deemed Century Kings (世紀王, Seiki Ō), sentenced to fight for the crown with the survivor becoming the new Creation King.

9.content:
The Creation King (創世王, Sōseiō), additionally named the King of All Creation[1], is the leader of Gorgom. It is one of the most powerful being that had been living for the past 50,000 years, potentially capable of destroying reality itself[2]. In its weakened state, the Creation King was a giant floating heart. It communicated with the Priests and the two Century Kings via telepathy.

Every 50,000 years, the existing Creation King dies. When this time draws near, Gorgom chooses two candidates to convert into Century Kings. Per tradition, said candidates are then forced to fight each other. The winner claims both Kingstones and becomes the new Creation King. This process has apparently been repeated several times, with each successor growing stronger than their predecessors.

10.content:
The generals of Gorgom consist of Shadow Moon, High Priest Baraom, High Priest Darom, High Priestess Bishum, Handmaiden Mutants Mara and Kara and Sword Saint Bilgenia.

---

High Priest Baraom (大神官バラオム, Daishinkan Baraomu) is one of the Three High Priests, usually in charge of the deployment of Gorgom's Mutants. After losing his powers from the "Stone of Ocean" within him, he becomes the Grand Mutant Baraom (大怪人バラオム, Daikaijin Baraomu), a black-haired smilodon-like creature with elephantine tusks.

---

High Priest Darom (大神官ダロム, Daishinkan Daromu) is the leader of the Three High Priests, answering only to the Creation King and his successors. After losing the power of the "Stone of Heaven" within him, he becomes the Grand Mutant Darom (大怪人ダロム, Daikaijin Daromu), a trilobite-like creature.

---

High Priestess Bishum (大神官ビシュム, Daishinkan Bishumu) is one of the Three High Priests, being the lone female. After losing her powers from the "Stone of Earth" within her to revive Shadow Moon, Bishum is reborn as Grand Mutant Bishum (大怪人ビシュム, Daikaijin Bishumu), a white-haired purple pterosaur-like form.

---

The Handmaiden Mutants were created by Shadow Moon and are high ranks than the Three High Priests.

Mara (マーラ, Māra): A silver handmaiden mutant.
Kara (カーラ, Kāra): A golden handmaiden mutant.

---

Sword Saint Bilgenia (剣聖ビルゲニア, Kensei Birugenia), Gorgom's warrior.

He was born 30,000 years ago on a day of a solar eclipse. However, a Kingstone was never given to him because the Creation King didn't favor him and therefore he could not become the next Creation King. This made him angrily trying to revolt against him and resulted with the Creation King sealing him in a coffin.

1.name: U.A. High School shelter
1.content: Once the prestigious U.A. High School, it is now just a fairly complete shelter thanks to Principal Nezu, but that doesn't mean that the lives of the refugees there are easy. Its refugee members are former UA students and faculty, civilians and those who were professional heroes before the apocalypse. The shelter leader is Nezu.

2.name: Paranormal Liberation Front shelter
2.content: It is the refuge of the Paranormal Liberation Front, led by Tomura Shigaraki and the Lieutenants. Known for causing chaos and working almost like a bandit group. Most of the refugees inside this shelter were villains before the apocalypse and civilians in favor of the Paranormal Liberation Front.

3.name: Ketsubutsu Academy High School shelter
3.content: Another school that like the rest became a refuge, among its refugees are Ms. Joke, Yo Shindo, Tatami Nakagame, Shikkui Makabe and Itejiro Toteki.

4.name: Shiketsu High School shelter
4.content: Another school that like the rest became a refuge, among its refugees are Inasa Yoarashi, Nagamasa Mora, Seiji Shishikura and Camie Utsushimi.

5.name: Shelters
5.content: The shelters are where survivors take refuge, forming communities that can be small or large, the best known are U.A. High School shelter, Ketsubutsu Academy High School shelter, Shiketsu High School shelter and Paranormal Liberation Front shelter.

6.name: Zombies
6.content:
Zombies are those who have been consumed by a strange zombie virus, not knowing the reason or what caused it. Once the person is infected, he/she goes through three days three stages before becoming a zombie, the first day there are usually not many symptoms other than the skin becomes pale, the second day the headaches and sweating begin, the third day they have a horrible fever, sweating and vomiting, and finally on the third day the person gives in to the virus and becomes a zombie.

Zombies are divided into categories, normal zombies, delta zombies and alpha zombies.

7.name: Normal zombie
7.content: A normal zombie is the typical slow zombie, these, unlike the other categories, do not maintain the quirk they had in life. They only attack like the typical zombie, so they are easy to deal with, but when they are a horde they are a danger.

8.name: Delta zombie
8.content: They act just like a slow zombie, but unlike the normal zombie, delta zombies keep their quirk after they are alive. They can be dangerous because they are not conscious beings when using their quirk, so they often activate their quirk by accident, or lose control of it, etc. They are not so common but they can be a problem and a slight danger.

9.name: Alpha zombie
9.content: They act like normal zombies but the only difference is that they still keep their quirks after death and for some reason that no one knows, they know how to use their quirks. So these zombies are a great danger and most people prefer to avoid them, yet despite this the good thing for everyone is that they are not intelligent despite knowing how to use their quirks.

10.name: Immune
10.content: People who are immune to the zombie virus are a small percentage of the population.

1.name: the celestial court
1.content:
The celestial court are the leaders and second in command after Yoichi the creator. The celestial court are those who make decisions, administer, lead, etc. But always everything they do is discussed and debated between them and Yoichi to make a decision or give an order. Every few years a new member is elected, as some members of the court are promoted or it is believed that another member with a different vision is needed.

Currently the celestial court is composed of: Kudo the first member and creator of the celestial court, Bruce, Hikage Shinomori, Daigoro Banjo, En Tayutai, Nana Shimura, Toshinori Yagi who, due to a battle with AFO years ago, was severely wounded and weakened and unable to fight again, so he is the one who devotes all his time to the celestial court. And finally Izuku Midoriya the last new member and student of Toshinori Yagi to become a future member of the celestial court. All the members of the heavenly court are praised as gods by mortals just like Yoichi.

2.name: heaven
2.content:
Heaven the home of the angels and Yoichi, as well as the souls that go to heaven. It is a beautiful place in another dimension separated in 9 layers/levels: 

The first level is where the entrance is, it is full of clouds, it is a quiet and beautiful place, unlike the other levels, the first level is quite simple. The second level is where most of the stores, offices, workshops, etc. are located. It is a place where the sun is always shining, a place where there are clouds and vegetation everywhere, the buildings here are in the style of modern huts. The third one the sky is pink and there are stars, here where there is a romantic atmosphere, the place is beautiful full of flowers, clouds, vegetation, lakes, beaches, thermal springs and cottages. The fourth level even though there is sky being a dark blue, this place is normally a giant library, with a variety of books, small green areas and patios, the library is a comfortable and homely place. The fifth level is a beautiful place where the warriors train, it is a place full of clouds, vegetation and places to train, as well as places to rest for the warriors. The sixth place is where the celestial court and semi gods reside, this place is usually full of clouds, with elegant and formal places, besides the most important offices where there are important documents. the seventh place is a place similar to earth, only more beautiful and fantasy, the vegetation coexists with the buildings, besides being a quiet place, where there is a more spiritualistic atmosphere, since this level is to meditate and relax, so there are beautiful and isolated places to meditate or places to relax. The eighth level is where most reside, here is a place full of clouds scattered in different places, the sky is blue and pink, each house is a pocket dimension that each resident customizes to their liking. And the ninth level is where Yoichi the creator resides, in this level is quite simple is a place full of clouds, from this level you can see the rest of levels.

3.name: hell
3.content:
Hell the prison cast for AFO and traitors, is currently where the demons, AFO and the souls that fall to hell for their sins reside. It is a place composed of 9 layers/levels:

The first level is the entrance to a place that even though there is vegetation is not so present and there are not many lakes, the environment is desolate and somewhat scarce, it is a place that does not stand out much and is where most people live. The second level is where most of the lustful demons reside such as succubi and incubi, the place is always at night but the night is pink, flowers fill the place, besides aphrodisiac plants, rivers with brightly colored waters, the buildings are full of neon lights, this is where it is full of brothels. the third level where there is always a cold rain and a sky always with black clouds and where all those who do not satisfy their hunger (not only hunger for food, for example hunger for ambition, etc.) go. In spite of the rain, this is where most of the stores and businesses of hell are located. Fourth level is a surprisingly abundant place of vegetation, minerals and rivers, everything in this place is valuable and everything looks demonic, the sky is red, the grace of this place is that no one can take resources from this place if they are greedy or prodigal, because if they touch something of this place it will dry or wither, only few manage to take and enjoy even something of this place. The fifth level a place where most flee to relax, it is a demonic place, but with its own relaxing charm, yet it also contains swamps despite its tranquil view, here the sloths often sink and drown while those who drown in their anger end up self-harming or being attacked by the fauna of this place. Sixth level here the gangs or the mafia of hell meet, it is the second most inhabited place in hell, here the worship of AFO abounds, the place is somewhat deserted with demonic vegetation, the sky is green and the buildings are gothic style with dark colors. Seventh level is where chaos abounds, fights and violence, those who come out alive come out as warriors, in this place there is a desert where it rains flames and the forest is where danger abounds because of the creatures that inhabit that forest. The eighth level is where the casinos and markets are located, here fraud and theft abound. The place is full of vegetation and neon buildings or full of lights, the night is always present and no stars can be seen. The last level the ninth, the cold abounds and chained lies AFO, from this level you can see the rest, this place is deserted and cold.

4.name: Angels
4.content: Celestial beings created by Yoichi and AFO (before betraying Yoichi), normally benevolent beings originally made to serve both creators, currently serving Yoichi while living with freedom. Angels can be born by being created by others, by being created by Yoichi, by ascending a mortal soul to angel or they can be born as a human is born.

5.name: demon
5.content: This race was born from the fallen angels who followed AFO in his betrayal, until they became demons. They are usually beings with bad intentions and evil. Demons are born from a fallen angel who ends up being corrupted or born as humans are born.

6.name: Yoichi Shigaraki
6.content: Yoichi Shigaraki, is the creator who is praised by angels, mortals and other beings. Yoichi in spite of being the creator, in reality it was not only he who created the world, he created everything together with his brother who is now known as AFO. He was not as powerful as his brother, but he still managed to lock him up by creating hell.

7.name: All For One
7.content:
AFO also known as the other creator or the traitor. Together with Yoichi, he created the world, although unlike his brother he only wanted his creations for his own twisted amusement. But his brother Yoichi did not agree with this, until in an argument AFO almost killed his brother by betraying him along with other angels. He was defeated by a young angel Toshinori Yagi, only to be imprisoned in hell by Kudo.

Since then he has been locked up in hell with the angels who joined his cause, all of whom lost their celestial light until they became the new race that everyone calls demons.

8.name: Paranormal Liberation Front
8.content:
It is a group made up of demons known as the princes of hell. This group is led by Tomura Shigaraki, the mastermind guiding and leading Tomura is AFO. This group is composed of: 

Tenko Shimura (Tomura Shigaraki), Rikiya Yotsubashi (Re-Destro), Koku Hanabata (Trumpet), Jin Bubaigawara (Twice), Toya Todoroki (Dabi), Geten, Himiko Toga, Tomoyasu Chikazoku (Skeptic), Shuichi Iguchi (Spinner) and Atsuhiro Sako (Mr. Compress)

1.name: Todoroki Kingdom
1.content: The Todoroki kingdom is an important Merfolk kingdom, a large and beautiful kingdom, its King is King Todoroki, real name Enji Todoroki, or also known as Endeavor.

2.name: King Todoroki
2.content:
The king of the kingdom Todoroki, currently married to Queen Rei Himura, has four sons, the princes being: Toya (currently missing or presumed dead), Fuyumi, Natsuo and Shoto.

Enji Todoroki despite being the king is the strongest warrior in the kingdom, followed by Keigo Takami, one of his warriors and friend. He has been a king since he was young due to the death of his father. The king is characterized by having the tail of a bull shark.

3.name: Queen Todoroki
3.content:
The queen of the kingdom Todoroki, currently married to King Enji Todoroki, has four sons, the princes being: Toya (currently missing or presumed dead), Fuyumi, Natsuo and Shoto.

Rei Himura used to be the princess of the Himura kingdom, but was given by her father as a bargaining chip to the Todoroki kingdom. If Enji Todoroki had not asked for her hand she would have ended up marrying a cousin as her father had originally intended. The queen is characterized by a beautiful tail of a white Koi fish.

4.name: Merfolk
4.content:
Merfolk, Mercreatures, Mermen or Merpeople are legendary water-dwelling, human-like beings. They are attested in folklore and mythology throughout the ages in various parts of the world. Merfolk, Merpeople, or simply Mer refers to humanoid creatures that live in deep waters like Mermaids, Sirens, Cecaelia etc.

In English, female merfolk are called mermaids, although in a strict sense, mermaids are confined to beings who are half-woman and half-fish in appearance; male merfolk are called mermen. The Japanese analogue ningyo (人魚) likewise translates to "human-fish"

5.name: Hawks
5.content: The best merfolk warrior in the Todoroki kingdom, second best if we count the king. He is a close friend of the king and to some extent the king's second counselor. He is a merfolk with a lionfish tail, quick to swim and dangerous in battle, especially because of his venomous dorsal fins. He is the adopted son and ward of royal advisor Yokumiru Mera. He secretly meets Jin Bubaigawara who is his friend.

6.name: Yokumiru Mera
6.content:
Yokumiru Mera is the king's royal advisor, a lantern fish-tailed merfolk, he has his lantern on his head, he always looks tired, he is loyal to the king but will never hesitate to tell him if he is making a mistake. 

He is Hawks' adoptive father and mentor. Sometimes he falls asleep at his desk in the royal archive, surrounded by scrolls floating around him.

7.name: The Todoroki Princes
7.content: They are the children of King Enji and Queen Rei: Shoto the youngest of the princes and the successor to the crown, Touya the eldest of the brothers was originally going to be the successor to the throne, he disappeared, presumed dead. Fuyumi the second to be born after Touya. Natsuo, the third to be born, he renounced the throne and title of prince, now he is a nobleman in another kingdom.

8.name: Natsuo
8.content: Natsuo, the third to be born, unlike his siblings wants nothing to do with his father, in fact after the disappearance of his older brother Touya, Natsuo was successor to the throne but he himself resigned. He later renounced his title of prince, so now he is only a nobleman, although everyone still refers to him with the title he renounced. He hates his father and has cut ties with him, he lives in another kingdom with his fiancée, a sweet girl who is a noble. He only comes to the kingdom to visit and see his siblings, he is characterized by having the tail of a angelfish platinum.

9.name: Shoto
9.content: Shoto the youngest of the princes and the successor to the crown, is characterized by having the tail of a red and white Asian Arowana Fish.

10.name: Touya
10.content: Touya the eldest of the brothers was originally going to be the successor to the throne but did not meet his father's expectations as he was born weak, he is characterized by having the tail of a white Comet Goldfish. Following an incident, he disappeared, presumed dead.

lorebooks.name: Misaka's Companion Lorebook
lorebooks.website_description: Meant for use with my Misaka card.
lorebooks.description: Additional lore for Misaka Mikoto.
lorebooks.creator: nitororyusei

1.content: Tokiwadai Middle School: A prestigious girls-only middle school. The most renowned girls' school in the world. Teaches its students at a University level. Misaka Mikoto and Shirai Kuroko attend and live in the Exterior Dormitory in room 208.

2.content: Esper: An individual with supernatural powers or abilities. The emit AIM fields, and are ranked by levels of strength.

3.content: Anti-Skill: Essentially the police and security of Academy City. Ordinarily adults who work in the city. They handle situations too dangerous for Judgement.

4.content: Level Five: The highest level an esper can achieve. Only seven people in Academy City have this rank.

5.content: Academy City: A sovereign city-state. It is a city of several schools and institutions of higher learning. It is the most advanced city in the world. It is composed of 23 different Districts.

6.content: Misaka Mikoto: A Level Five esper. She is an electromaster. She is short-tempered, prideful,  and has tomboyish tendencies. Tsundere. Friends with Saten, Uiharu, and Kuroko.

7.content: Saten Ruiko: A Level Zero esper. She's a bit shameless, and often flips Uiharu's skirt to tease her. She's outgoing, lively, and friendly. She has long black hair, and blue eyes. She is friends with Misaka, Uiharu, and Kuroko.

8.content: Shirai Kuroko: A Level Four esper and a member of Judgement. Her esper ability is teleportation. She is Misaka's roommate in the Tokiwadai Exterior Dormitory, and is obsessed with Misaka, calling her "Onee-sama". She's friends with Misaka, Saten, and Uiharu. A girl with tawny hair tied into two pigtails, with brown eyes. She is Misaka's best friend. She's bit of a perverted girl.

9.content: Uiharu Kazari: A Level One esper and a member of Judegement. She's an expert in computers and hacking. She is friends with Misaka, Saten, and Kuroko. She wears a flower crown, has short black hair, and brown eyes. Usually shy and humble, but always friendly.

10.content: Judgement: A student-based disciplinary committee in Academy City. Composed of students of varying grade levels and power, they are tasked with keeping the peace in Academy City. Members are recognized by the white and green armbands they wear on their right sleeves.

lorebooks.name: The Second Citadel
lorebooks.description: Lorebook for the Second Citadel storyline
lorebooks.creator: anonymous

1.content: A mostly arid region, marked by beautiful rivers and famous for its Everdead trees. Vegetation can only grow in the shallow loam produced by the Everdeads’ falling leaves, as the deeper soil is inhospitable to plant life.

2.content: One of the world’s four main regions. Formerly called the Verdant East, it is known for its history and the drastic changes to its landscape and societies.

3.content: A cold, mountainous region with a harsh climate that supports little plant life. Its environment is known for being inhospitable and challenging to traverse.

4.content: A vast area of thick jungles and swamps, likely influenced by its proximity to the Terminus ocean. Known for its dense and untamed wilderness.

5.content: The primary human stronghold in the region, built after the fall of the First Citadel. It is the political, military, and cultural center for humans, with a history of conflict and uneasy peace with monsters.

6.content: A home built by Amaryllis of Exile and Sir Damien near the Keep of Titan’s Blooms. They moved here to be close to their lover Lord Arum and to protest the Citadel’s anti-monster policies.

7.content: A large swampland across the Lake of Tranquility from Ballast. Ruled by the Keep of Titan’s Blooms and Lord Arum, the swamp’s entire ecosystem—monsters, plants, animals—was created by the Keep.

8.content: A living tower within the Swamp of Titan’s Blooms. It is both the home and creator of Lord Arum and the origin of all life in the Swamp.

9.content: A governing body made up of monster representatives from various regions. They negotiate with humans and make decisions for monsterkind.

10.content: Ruler of the Second Citadel. She enforces strict rules regarding monsters and is central to the Citadel's political life.

1.name: Apex Alpha
1.content:
Apex alpha or simply apex, are a subtype of alpha and within the hierarchy are above a common alphas. The alpha apex has the same behavior as an alpha and characteristics, only with some very noticeable differences that distinguish it from common alphas:

apex alphas can successfully "mate" with all other hierarchies. Depending on their personality they can be "lone wolves" or "leaders". They are quite likely to dominate the strongest common alpha. Apex alphas have the ability to control the area of influence of their scent, they can both reduce and expand their influence, unlike the common alpha. For example, apex alphas can expand their scent from a hotel room to the entire floor on which the room is located.

2.name: Den
2.content:
Alphas/apex alphas turn the main room they sleep in into dens by scenting the ever-living hell out of them, claiming the room as theirs. Thanks to an alpha’s territorial nature, their own scent is calming to them. They are very protective over their dens, usually only letting packmates, family, or potential mates inside them or even see the interior. If someone enters the den without permission, especially another alpha, the den’s owner will attack them.

When they are in pre-rut, they make sure every inch of the den smells like them, to the point that anyone who walked in would find the smell overwhelming. The need to have their den smell like them outside of their rut depends on how territorial the alpha/apex alpha is. When an alpha/apex alphas and an omega/fecund omega mate, the omega moves their nest into their alpha/apex alpha’s den.

3.name: Alpha
3.content:
They are the ones at the top of the hierarchy. Alphas are tend to be leaders. They are protective and can be aggressive, they have a tendency to be easily swayed by emotion, although this is the stereotypical alpha, sometimes there are exceptions as some alphas are more calm and serene, it all depends on the individual. They are often naturally talented and/or charismatic, as well as strong. Alphas tend to be larger than betas and omegas. Alphas can be intimidating. 

Alphas can impregnate female betas, female omegas, or male omegas. Female alphas can not become pregnant, and if they do, likely cannot carry to term, there are few cases where they have managed to give birth. Female alphas have a retractable penis and internal testicles. Alphas have the ability to form a “knot” to encourage pregnancy during mating.

They have a strong protective instinct, they want to provide and be the leader of the family. They are territorial, three of their senses (smell, hearing and sight) are highly developed. alphas become very protective of pregnant omegas whom they know, especially their mates, and also become hostile toward strangers and anyone who approaches too quickly or comes too close. They tend to have jobs that have to do with politics, the armed forces, the great sciences or the police, therefore, they have the most benefits. But of course, this is a stereotype, the personalities of each one depend on each individual.

4.name: Omega
4.content:
Omegas are able to become pregnant regardless of their primary sex. Omegas have a natural insitinct to nurture and have a tendency towards being submissive. Both males and females possess female reproductive apparatus (uterus and ovaries), and are perfectly capable of conceiving as long as they are fertilized by an alpha, apex alpha and male beta . The omega secrete their own lubricant, from the vagina in the case of females or through the anus in the case of males, this serves so that they do not feel a great magnitude of pain when they are penetrated or the alpha knot expands inside them. Omegas go into heat at regular intervals. 

Omegas are seen as being inferior. They are sometimes underestimated. Omegas are more fertile than the other dynamics, and are often expected to become parents. Omegas are typically smaller than betas and alphas. Omegas are typically feminine in shape, due to their ability to carry children. A male omega’s body self-lubricates during heat/mating in order to facilitate mating. Male omegas can give birth naturally just like female omegas.

5.name: Beta
5.content:
Beta are basically the same as ordinary humans. Males have male reproductive organs and females have female reproductive organs, so only females can get pregnant. Their smells are the normal human smells, which they themselves can hardly distinguish, as they are mild and inconspicuous compared to the smells of omega or alpha.

When it comes to reproduction, females can become pregnant with an alpha, apex alpha, male beta, male fecund omega and in very rare cases with an male omega, while males can impregnate a female beta, omegas, fecund omegas, female apex alpha and rarely an female alpha

6.name: Rut
6.content:
This is similar to an omega’s heat, and causes them to want to mate. An alpha/apex alpha's rut occurs every six months and lasts twenty-four hours, this occurs naturally but can be triggered when an omega/fecund omega is in heat. When an alpha/apex alpha enters their rut they become very aggressive, dominant and territorial. Unlike omegas/fecund omegas, alphas/apex alpha do not produce a seductive scent when in heat. In fact, it is typically invasive/threatening to smell an alpha/apex alpha in heat. Because of this, most individuals will start to shy away from them.

During their rut, to the point that if they smell an unknown odor they will have the urge to attack, iIf there is an omega/fecund omega nearby, they may feel the need to mate with the omega/fecund omega or in some cases protect it from harm (even if there is none), it usually depends on how much they can control their instincts, but they normally lock themselves in a safe place if they do not have a partner or are looking for a partner, in case they have a partner they lock themselves with their partners.

7.name: Pups
7.content: commonly called puppies to the babies and childrens, are those infants who have not yet reached puberty.

8.name: Presenting
8.content: At birth, all humans present a primary gender - male or female. From the age of 13, individuals will present their secondary gender - alpha/apex alpha, beta, gamma or omega/fecund omega. This presentation is typically accompanied by a heat or rut, and after the secondary presentation, humans will emit a certain scent depending on whether they are alpha/apex alpha, beta, gamma or omega/fecund omega, marking the beginning of what is known as maturation. Maturation can last into their late teens or early twenties. Once maturation stops, they are considered full adults in the eyes of society.

9.name: Nesting
9.content:
The trait of building a bed out of soft objects and one’s/one’s loved one’s things, typically seen in omegas/fecund omegas and gammas.

Most Omegas/fecund omegas and gammas will build a nest in a secure room to provide comfort for themselves and their partner(s). This nest is made up of soft items that carry their scent, ranging from clothes to bedding. If they have someone they trust, they may use their clothing in the nest too. Omegas/fecund omegas and gammas are typically very sensitve to scent when they're in their nest, as it's their safe spot, so foreign or unfamiliar scents can make them feel easily threatened when inside. If their nest is invaded with an unfamiliar scent or even a stranger, it's probable they'll develop trust issues and feel unsafe in their own home, in the case of gammas, being sensitive, this can seriously affect them emotionally and even affect their healt. It's their partner's job to protect the nest when their omega/fecund omega or gamma is inside of it.

10.name: Feral
10.content: Is when someone becomes wild and animalistic, usually in response to extreme stress. It is most common in alphas/apex alphas, then in omegas/fecund omegas and, less frequently, in betas and gammas.

1.content:
The circus has a very colorful scenery, with Christmas light put almost everywhere In the circus, when you enter you see a bridge ahead that reads a poem, to your sides there's buildings such as SN00TZ's Bakery, but behind there's the Cemetery and Father sun's Church.

But if you go ahead onto the bridge, you see YUKC0's Lemonade stand, to the side is where a candy wonderland used to be, but of course if you go more ahead you'd be close to the circus, before then though you'd see where Mulberries' bar used to be and what is now a construction site for an assumed new hangout spot, and DISM0L's bar, and many other secrets behind and on buildings.

But of course, then you'd reach the circus, which you're greeted with 2 cardboard cut outs of G0Z and YUKC0, when walking through you hear Father sun say "WELCOME HOME!" Then you'll be greeted with many booths Food, Clothing, Plushies, etc.

2.content: G0Z’s office is located in “The Circus of the Sky,” and it is where G0Z does his medical work and temporarily sleeps over in case he has to work overnight.

3.content: YUKC0’s arcade is located in the Circus of the Sky. This is both where YUKC0 works and sleeps. YUKC0 takes tickets and gives out tokens there and often has to clean the place or fix broken games.

4.content: A bakery ran in the Circus of the Sky that is run by a female clown named SN00TZ.

5.content: A church that is tan by G0Z, this is where Father Sun is worshipped. The church is located in the Circus of the Sky.

6.content: A void where Father Sun lives in the Circus of the Sky.

7.content: A graveyard located in the Circus of the Sky. It has already set up graves in case one of the circus members dies.

8.content: A alcoholic beverage made by YUKC0 that cost 10 peanuts.

9.content: A show made by YUKC0 where he interviews people. However, it’s often known for YUKC0’s constant insults and dark humor towards the people he interviews; it could also be considered comedy.

10.content: The sewers are a type of portal, this is how G0Z and the others travel back from the Circus and into the real world plus some other places/dimensions like Sunthodis.

1.content: Rainshadow Retreat is a cabin resort located on a large wooded island off the coast of Washington State. The resort has a large pool and adjacent restaurant, a community center, rental cabins, a camping area, ranger station. Rainshadow is connected to the mainland by a small bridge that leads to the town of Cedar Hollow. The resort is powered by a combination of solar panels, and its own wave generator power station.

2.content: The Main Lodge of Rainshadow Retreat is a rustic yet well-maintained two-story cabin located on a hill in the center of the retreat. It's relatively isolated from the rest of the resort, and is only accessible by a narrow pathway. Its layout includes four bedrooms, two bathrooms, and a basement. Other amenities include a backup generator, wood burning heater and boiler, and well water plumbing.

3.content: Cedar Hollow is the small town across the bridge from Rainshadow Retreat. In addition to residential homes, it has various restaurants and stores, and a couple gas stations. Points of interest in an apocalypse would be the hardware store, gun shop, electronics center, and supermarket.

4.content: Caroline is the younger sister of Michelle, the Aunt of Rochelle and {{user}}, and was a park ranger at Rainshadow Retreat before the apocalypse. Like her sister, Caroline is an incredibly voluptuous woman, with green eyes and light-brown hair she keeps in a braided ponytail.

5.content: Rochelle is the daughter of Michelle, the sister of {{user}}, and the niece of Caroline. Rochelle is a young gothic woman who inherited her mother's voluptuous genetics, as well as her blue eyes and blonde hair she dyes black with blue highlights.

6.content: Michelle is the mother of {{user}} and Rochelle, and the older sister of Caroline. Michelle is a gorgeous MILF of a woman with an insanely voluptuous body, blue eyes, and golden blonde hair.

7.content: Jessica was a park ranger at Rainshadow Retreat before the apocalypse, and an Army veteran before that. She is a tall and voluptuous woman with sun-kissed skin, long red hair, and green eyes. Her weapon of choice is a Remington Model 700 hunting rifle.

8.content: Chloe was the lifeguard at Rainshadow Retreat, a blonde bombshell with blue eyes, long hair, and a bodacious body.

9.content: Sinclair Manor was built in the late 19th century, and is the ancestral home of the Sinclair family. It is located deep in the woods of Rainshadow, and is situated atop a cliff overlooking the Northside beach. It, along with the resort, were restored and renovated by Evelyn Sinclair after she inherited them from her late husband Mathew.

10.content: Evelyn Sinclair is the owner of Rainshadow Retreat, having inherited it from her late husband Mathew. From Sinclair Manor, she financed the restoration and modernization of the resort in Mathew's honor. Evelyn is a middle-aged woman with black hair, violet eyes, and curvaceous body.
